The main goal of this course is to expose students to modern ideas in statistical inference, 
ranging from classical hypothesis testing to post-selection inference

## Program and resources

* Hypothesis testing: a review
* The crisis of modern science
* Global testing in high-dimensions: higher criticism
* Multiple testing and error rates
* FWER control: Bonferroni and Holm
* FDR control: Benjamini-Hochberg procedure
* Post-selection inference: closed testing
